actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 98-275.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 291 - 110 (Record Vote No: 234).

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 1) to amend and extend certain Federal laws that establish housing and community and neighborhood development and preservation programs, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 1 (housing and community development assistance).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 1) to amend and extend certain Federal laws that establish housing and community and neighborhood development and preservation programs, and for other purposes.
